attributes.action: enquire why the popular cult snack Space Raiders has gone from 10p to 15p
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is set up in repsonse to popular cult snack Space Raiders being increased to 15p from 10p. Many people consider this to be outrageous.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
